Je suis intervenu auprès d'Axa France pour négocier la prime et insisté pour la revoir à la baisse et j’ai le plaisir de vous informer la révison de la prime annuelle 2024 pour un montant de  € 7 167.01 TTC, soit une économie de € 763.17 TTC 

 

Following my intervention with Axa France I negotiate the premium and insisted on lowering it .

I am pleased to inform you of the revision Y2024 annual premium  for an amount of €7,167.01 including tax,  so a saving of €763.17 including tax. 

 

Negocation was not easy, as the war in Ukraine and its energy consequences and especially the recurrence of climatic events, all major issues weighing on the French economy. 

The Insurance activity has not been spared, particularly in its Auto, Home and Property Damage branches.

 

Also, We inform you that due to poor technical results all companies have increased premiums for the 2024 financial year; this having been widely reported by the French press: TF1, France 2, BFM TV…… 

 

As you know since many years, we are always concerned to defend the interests of O.C for all its polices. 

 

Summary of the premium due  : € 7 017.44 Vat Included and renewal invitation above

Either an amount of €7,780.61 including tax

 

Je suis intervenu auprès d'Axa France pour négocier la prime et insisté pour la revoir à la baisse et j’ai le plaisir de vous informer la révison de la prime annuelle 2024 pour un montant de  € 7 167.01 TTC, soit une économie de € 763.17 TTC 

 

Following my intervention with Axa France I negotiate the premium and insisted on lowering it .

I am pleased to inform you of the revision Y2024 annual premium  for an amount of €7,167.01 including tax,  so a saving of €763.17 including tax. 

 

Negocation was not easy, as the war in Ukraine and its energy consequences and especially the recurrence of climatic events, all major issues weighing on the French economy. 

The Insurance activity has not been spared, particularly in its Auto, Home and Property Damage branches.

 

Also, We inform you that due to poor technical results all companies have increased premiums for the 2024 financial year; this having been widely reported by the French press: TF1, France 2, BFM TV…… 

 

As you know since many years, we are always concerned to defend the interests of O.C for all its polices. 

 

Summary of the premium due  : € 7 017.44 Vat Included and renewal invitation above

 

1.	2024 : € 7 167.01 Vat Included
2.	2023 : Refund of € 149.57 Vat Included

 

We remain at your disposal for any infoi needed and look forward to hearing back from you. 

All the best 

 

Joe Nasr
